{"step_by_step_thinking": "Gutta percha is a material used in endodontics for root canal fillings. The carrier-based gutta percha system uses a plastic carrier to deliver the gutta percha into the root canal. The plastic carrier is typically made from a type of plastic that can withstand the heat used to soften the gutta percha. Polypropylene is a type of plastic that is commonly used in medical devices due to its heat resistance and biocompatibility.", "answer_choice": "B. Poly propylene"}
